function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing in public transport","Impact":"Increased transmission of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforcement of safe distance markers and reduction in maximum capacity of transport","Technologies":"Automated door systems, protective barriers for drivers and workers","People":"Public transport users, drivers, workers","Owner":"Transport authorities"},{"Description":"Insufficient green areas in urban zones","Impact":"Limited contribution to public health and sustainability","Mitigation":"Gradual implementation of green areas in urban zones","Technologies":"Urban planning, landscaping technologies","People":"Urban residents, city planners","Owner":"City planning authorities"}]}
